price: 3. Habeenka Qadarku (camalka iyo cibaadeysigeed) wuxuu ka khayr iyo ajar badan yahay kun bilood (83 sano iyo afar bilood).
arabic: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahrin
